00012 TypeGroup::TypeGroup(QWidget *parent):
00013 QGroupBox(tr("Type"), parent),
00014 componentBox_(tr("Component"), this),
00015 busApiBox_(tr("Bus/API"), this),
00016 advancedBox_(tr("Advanced"), this),
00017 options_() {
00018 
00019         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00020         layout->addWidget(&componentBox_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00021         layout->addWidget(&busApiBox_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00022         layout->addWidget(&advancedBox_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00023         layout->setSpacing(0);
00024 
00025         componentBox_.setChecked(true);
00026         busApiBox_.setChecked(true);
00027         advancedBox_.setChecked(false);
00028 
00029         connect(&componentBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00030                 this, SLOT(onComponentChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&busApiBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00032                 this, SLOT(onBusChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         connect(&advancedBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00034                 this, SLOT(onAdvancedChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035 }

00037 TypeGroup::~TypeGroup() {
00038 }

00040 void TypeGroup::onComponentChange( int state ) {
00041         options_.components_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00042         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TypeGroup::onBusChange( int state ) {
00046         options_.buses_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00047         emit optionsChanged(options_);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void TypeGroup::onAdvancedChange( int state ) {
00051         options_.advanced_ = Utils::checkBoxState2Bool(state);
00052         emit optionsChanged(options_);
